hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that #inside Ganon's Castle# hoards #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Piece of Heart#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Strength Upgrade#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that the #Fire Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #the Spirit Temple# hoards #a Shadow Temple Small Key#.
hinted_locations: Spirit Temple Sun Block Room Silver Rupee Center Front

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #Bombs (5 pieces)# and #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #a Recovery Heart#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# teaches #Double Defense#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Piece of Heart#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: Expired Spoiler Log? Don't worry! The OoTR Discord staff can help you out.

HC (Malon).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# teaches #Double Defense#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that inside the #lakeside lab# a person and a spider hold...^ #a Red Rupee# and #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that a #fractured desert wall# hides #Granny's Potion Shop#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that ##Zora's River## has #2# major items.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that plundering #Gerudo's Fortress# is a foolish choice.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that #deep in the wasteland# is #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that #the Market# is on the way of the hero.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that #Kakariko Village# is on the path to #the Tower#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that the #final treasures of Ice Cavern# are...^ #Bombs (5 pieces)# and #the Sun's Song#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #an Ice Trap#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #inside Ganon's Castle# hoards #a Bottle#.
hinted_locations: Ganons Castle Spirit Trial Invisible Chest

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that a #heavy pillar# outside the castle obstructs the #Zora Shop#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that plundering #the Lost Woods# is a foolish choice.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #Arrows (30 pieces)# and #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that #the Spirit Temple# hoards #the Prelude of Light#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that a #tent in the valley# covers a #Great Fairy Fountain#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that #inside Ganon's Castle# is on the path to #the Tower#.
hinted_locations: Ganons Castle Water Trial Right Chest

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Piece of Heart#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: On second thought, let's not go to Hyrule Castle. 'Tis a silly place.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Strength Upgrade#.

ToT (Left).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Piece of Heart#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that the #Spirit Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

ToT (Right).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #an Ice Trap#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that ##the Desert Colossus## has #0# major items.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that plundering #the Desert Colossus# is a foolish choice.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that #the Market# is on the path to #the Tower#.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #a Recovery Heart#.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Strength Upgrade#.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that the #Shadow Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that #Kokiri Forest# is on the way of the hero.
